headline.main: BRITISH KING, QUEEN TOUR BOMBED AREAS; Elizabeth Decorates Farm Wife For Capture of Nazi Flier

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 1--King George and Queen Elizabeth toured the East Midlands district of England today visiting families whose houses had just been destroyed by a bombing raid, inspecting coastal antiinvasion defenses and reviewing work being done by troops and munitions workers.
